quote: I smiled sadly and whispered, ""I would have taken a bullet for you, too, you know.""""I know,"" he whispered gruffly and lifted my chin, ""and that pisses me off and turns me on at the same time.
quote_letters: I SMILED SADLY AND WHISPERED I WOULD HAVE TAKEN A BULLET FOR YOU TOO YOU KNOWI KNOW HE WHISPERED GRUFFLY AND LIFTED MY CHIN AND THAT PISSES ME OFF AND TURNS ME ON AT THE SAME TIME
